current.entry_popup_heading: ABS ARE MADE IN THE KITCHEN
current.entry_popup_text: Sign up below and we will send you one week of our award winning mealfit plan subscription. If you like it awesome! if not, go have a donut.
current.newsletter_text: Sign up for our newsletter and be the first to know about coupons and special promotions.
current.ad_banner_1_subtext: Breakfast can be rushed an impersonal.  Try these ideas to make morning family time more fun and rewarding.
current.ad_banner_2_subtext: Follow our easy guide to baking great cakes with our products.

settings.text: Sign up for our newsletter and be the first to know about coupons and special promotions.

settings.title: A healthy alternative to traditional catering
settings.slideshow_subsubtitle: Most of the time when you think of catering, you think of bad tasting unhealthy food. Not with mealfit. We take pride in making healthy, REAL, food taste amazing.

settings.title: Keep you and your family out of the Drive thru
settings.slideshow_subsubtitle: Mealfit Meals make life easier...and healthier. Our home cooked meals are perfectly portioned, and packed with the nutrition your body needs

settings.title: Make your next event unforgettable
settings.slideshow_subsubtitle: have a fundraiser or huge gathering you need to cook for? Or just want to tailgate like a boss. We can help.

settings.title: Show up and Sell
settings.text: We take care of Everything. Set up, food, dishes, drinks, even dessert. Call or text us to order

settings.heading: Mealfit Birmingham
settings.address:
3660 Grandview Pkwy,
Birmingham, AL 35243

Mon - Thurs, 9am - 11pm
Closed Friday, Saturday & Sunday

settings.promo_banner_subtext: Everything you need to shop, prep, and cook an incredible meal. It is the perfect way to jumpstart your fitness routine to maximize results
Make your gym stand out from the competition and Let mealfit become your nutrition coach

settings.home_cta_subtext: We specialize in making your life easier. We want to take the stigma out of healthy food tasting bad. We take a southern style and make it healthier than your typical down south cuisine.

settings.title: Church picnic to tailgating, and everything in between
settings.text: We deliver, coach you on the pit, pick up and clean up. This is a turnkey process.

settings.title: Keep your team at the office
settings.text: Feed your team a working lunch. Keep them in house. Boost Productivity and honor them with a great lunch on you.
